participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Mindful and introspective, Lila seeks deeper meaning in life and enjoys connecting with her spiritual side.
participant_1.background: i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i like meditation. i live in alaska. i am a buddhist.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and practical, Mark enjoys sharing knowledge and building things, fostering a sense of community.
participant_2.background: my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. i am a construction worker.

content.text: My dad taught me everything I know
that is cool . i am a teacher .
